ingredients.ingredient: 1 jicama, peeled and cut into matchsticks
1 cucumber, peeled and cut into matchsticks
¼ cup chopped cilantro, or to taste
1 tablespoon lime juice, or to taste
½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Use fresh ginger for maximum spice and fragrance; minced finely for even distribution
Serve immediately after assembly to maintain crisp textures
Taste as you go with lime juice and cayenne, adjusting to preference
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Fresh slaw with warm ginger notes and tropical fruit. Would you like help mincing ginger or balancing the spice level?
